snippet: The eclipse of scribal manuscripts by the printed book coincided with - and arguably contributed to - tremendous changes in society. Could the possible eclipse of print by digital communications also lead to an epochal societal shift?

snippet: Marvel Comics, the publishing home of heroes like Spider-Man and the X-Men, will release a free application for the iPad that will give readers access to a digital library of more than 500 comics from its 70-year history.
